text: DI DEKRET VOL por des benefit your INFAN; VIR gets twice AKCI female Se inheritors est nur women plur than 2 ili get two-thirds de ki bequeathed Nur unu daughter las sxi gets one-half. parents deceased get one-sixth inheritance each deceased las any infan. Li ne las infan his parents est nur inheritors mother gets one-third! Li hav siblings tiam mother gets one-sixth. All this post fulfilling any vol deceased las post pag off all debts. When gxi ven your parents your infan vi ne kon which de them est really bon al vi plej beneficial. This est di legx. DI est Omniscient SAGX
